edu.purdue.dtf

Class GameView

  • java.lang.Object
    • GLSurfaceView
      • edu.purdue.dtf.GameView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BoardListener

    public class GameView
extends GLSurfaceView
implements BoardListener
    GameView takes care of drawing and receiving user input. It is also responsible for loading all the resources it needs to do so, such as the 3D objects and textures.
